response.overview: As the number of dead animals found in the yard of the abandoned house in the town increases day by day, a local resident of the village, Efe, reaches out to journalism student Zeynep when he cannot reach major journalists. While Zeynep and Efe attempt to uncover the connection between this abandoned house and the animal deaths, they embark on a journey from which there is no turning back.
response.title: Ancient Voice
